entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
